maintainability_notes: Clear message history provides audit trail; conversations are debuggable
GroupChat coordination visible but can be verbose; speaker selection adds complexity
Explicit state schema makes data flow clear; graph structure is reviewable
Routing logic is explicit and testable; supervisor code can become complex
Role/task model is intuitive; automatic coordination reduces boilerplate
Manager adds oversight but behavior can be opaque; good for quality control
Full control but high maintenance; no framework overhead
State machine pattern is clear but requires careful design
